en.title: Educational Background
en.description: A glimpse at where I came from

en.title: Bachelors of Science in Electrical Engineering
en.description: Started doing lab research as an undergrad, where I built and programmed automated testing chambers to induce Rayleigh and Ricean Fading Patterns for antennas.

en.title: Masters of Science in Electrical Engineering
en.description: Continued research work from  undergrad  using an NSF Fellowship. The fellowship included working with k-5 schools, performing curriculum design with teachers and in-class lessons with students.

en.title: Doctorate of Philosophy in Electrical Engineering
en.description: Built and programmed automated systems for measurement, while also coding discrete time and finite element simulators for electromagnetic devices. Participated in a mentorship program with pre-college students.
